text: Lenk or Lenk im Simmental is a municipality in the administrative district of Obersimmental-Saanen in the canton of Bern in Switzerland. ==References== ==Other websites== * Official Website of Lenk * Tourism website of the region * Live pictures from Lenk * Aerial views of Lenk Category:Ski areas and resorts in Switzerland Category:Municipalities in Obersimmental-Saanen
title: Lenk
